TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509ClientCertificateAuthentication extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定用於驗證用戶端憑證的驗證內容。

span.span: Specifies authentication properties for validating the client certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 設定為 ，您就必須建立繼承自 類別的自訂憑證驗證程式。If the is set to , then you must create a custom certificate validator that inherits from the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立採用自訂憑證驗證程式服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-service-that-employs-a-custom-certificate-validator.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Service that Employs a Custom Certificate Validator](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-service-that-employs-a-custom-certificate-validator.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#1)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::X509CertificateValidationMode CertificateValidationMode { System::ServiceModel::Security::X509CertificateValidationMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::X509CertificateValidationMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定憑證驗證模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的允許值為：Allowed values of are: - - - - - ## Examples 下列範例會使用 列印至螢幕。The following example uses the to print to the screen. [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#7)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Selectors::X509CertificateValidator ^ CustomCertificateValidator { System::IdentityModel::Selectors::X509CertificateValidator ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Selectors::X509CertificateValidator ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂用戶端憑證驗證程式。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom client certificate validator.

value.span: 自訂用戶端憑證驗證程式。

span.span: The custom client certificate validator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 屬性設定為 ，您就必須將 屬性設定為繼承自 類別的自訂驗證程式。If the property is set to , you must set the property to a custom validator that inherits from the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立採用自訂憑證驗證程式服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-service-that-employs-a-custom-certificate-validator.md)。For more information, see [How to: Create a Service that Employs a Custom Certificate Validator](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-service-that-employs-a-custom-certificate-validator.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#2)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

exception.span: 設定 () 認證何時為唯讀。

span.span: when credential is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeWindowsGroups { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IncludeWindowsGroups : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 Windows 群組是否包含在授權內容中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the authorization context.

value.span: 如果 Windows 群組包含在授權內容中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if Windows groups are included in the authorization context; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只在 屬性設定為 `true` 時才有效。This property is valid only when the property is set to `true`. 只有在您不需要建立使用者所屬群組的清單時，才可以將這個屬性設定為 `false`；如果應用程式和授權決策不需要 Windows 群組，這項設定將有助於提升效能。Set this property to `false` only if you do not need to establish the list of groups a user belongs to - this may result in a performance benefit if your application and authorization decisions do not require Windows groups. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#3)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MapClientCertificateToWindowsAccount { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MapClientCertificateToWindowsAccount : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出憑證是否對應到 Windows 帳戶。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the certificate is mapped to Windows accounts.

value.span: 如果憑證對應到 Windows 帳戶，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the certificate is mapped to Windows accounts; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若是使用繫結上的憑證用戶端認證類型，此憑證就不會對應到 Windows 帳戶。When using the certificate client credential type on bindings, the certificate is not mapped to Windows accounts. 您可以使用這個屬性來覆寫這個行為。You can override this behavior using this property. 當這個屬性設定為 `true` 時，用戶端憑證中的身分識別就會對應到 Windows 帳戶。When this property is set to `true`, it causes the identity from the client certificate to be mapped to a Windows account. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#4)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

exception.span: 設定 () 認證何時為唯讀。

span.span: when credential is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509RevocationMode RevocationMode { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509RevocationMode get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509RevocationMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 ChainTrust 和 PeerOrChainTrust X.509 憑證驗證的憑證撤銷模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate revocation mode for ChainTrust and PeerOrChainTrust X.509 certificate validation.

value.span: 中的其中一個值：、 或 。

span.span: One of the values in : , , or .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用憑證時，系統會檢查用戶端憑證不在撤銷憑證清單中，驗證用戶端憑證尚未遭到撤銷。When using certificates, the system validates that the client certificate is not revoked, by checking that the client certificate is not in the revoked certificate list. 這項檢查可以藉由線上檢查或是核對快取的撤銷清單來執行。This check can be performed either by checking online or by checking against a cached revocation list. 將此屬性設定為 可以關閉撤銷檢查。Revocation checking can be turned off by setting this property to . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用憑證](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/working-with-certificates.md)。For more information, see [Working with Certificates](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/working-with-certificates.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code shows how to set this property. [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#5)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

exception.span: 設定 () 認證何時為唯讀。

span.span: when credential is read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation TrustedStoreLocation { System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation get(); void set(System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::StoreLocation value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要在其內容中驗證用戶端憑證鏈結的受信任存放區位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the trusted store location under which context the client certificate chain is validated.

value.span: 要在其內容中驗證用戶端憑證鏈結的受信任存放區位置。

span.span: The trusted store location under which context the client certificate chain is validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指定是否要使用電腦或使用者內容來驗證 X.509 憑證鏈結。This property specifies whether machine or user context is used to verify the X.509 certificate chain. ## Examples [!code-csharp[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/cs/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[X509ClientCertificateAuthentication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/x509clientcertificateauthentication/vb/source.vb#6)] 這個屬性也可以在組態檔中設定。The property can also be set in a configuration file. ``` ```

exception.span: 設定 () 認證何時為唯讀。

span.span: when credential is read-only.
